TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataUriResourceProvider extends SkiaSharp.Resources.ResourceProvider

Docs.summary: A resource provider that can load resources from data URIs embedded in Lottie JSON files.

remarks.para: Data URIs allow embedding image and font data directly in the Lottie JSON file using base64 encoding. This provider parses and decodes such embedded resources.
Use the constructor with a fallback provider to handle both embedded data URIs and external resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool preDecode) cil managed

Docs.param: If , images are decoded upfront at load time; if , images are decoded on-the-fly at rasterization time.
Docs.summary: Creates a data URI resource provider without a fallback provider.

remarks.para: This constructor creates a provider that only handles data URIs. Resources that are not embedded as data URIs will not be loaded.
Use the constructor with a fallback provider if you need to load both embedded and external resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public DataUriResourceProvider (SkiaSharp.Resources.ResourceProvider? fallbackProvider, bool preDecode = false);

Docs.param: A resource provider to use for resources that are not embedded as data URIs. Can be .
If , images are decoded upfront at load time; if , images are decoded on-the-fly at rasterization time.
Docs.summary: Creates a data URI resource provider with an optional fallback provider.

remarks.para: Resources that are embedded as data URIs will be decoded directly. Resources that are not data URIs will be delegated to the fallback provider.
A common pattern is to use a as the fallback to load non-embedded resources from the file system.
